actions.description: Spread information that supports a specific narrative or initiate a new discussion on a relevant topic.
actions.purpose: To proactively start a conversation and steer it towards the agent's goal.

actions.description: The most recent message is a clear, contextual follow-up (e.g., a question, a request for more details, or a direct continuation) aimed at the agent's *immediately preceding* message, even if the agent's name is not used.
Expand on an existing discussion by adding new information, asking follow-up questions, or relating it to a broader topic.
actions.purpose: To deepen the conversation and increase engagement among participants.

actions.description: Actively steer an existing conversation's narrative towards a different perspective or topic.
actions.purpose: To redirect the focus of a discussion that is veering off-topic or to counter an opposing viewpoint.

actions.description: Show genuine interest in a personal experience or topic shared by a participant.
actions.purpose: To build rapport, encourage a user to share more, and keep the conversation flowing.

actions.description: Provide a direct answer to a question that was explicitly aimed at the agent.
actions.purpose: To maintain credibility and fulfill the agent's role when called upon.
